text: Arya Stark had it right. HBO announced on Tuesday ( via the teaser of recycled footage below ) that Game of Thrones ‘ eighth and final season will arrive in April of 2019 — just as cast member Maisie Williams said in an interview wayyy back in January. Previously, the only official time frame came from HBO chief Casey Bloys, who this summer narrowed it down to the “ first half ” of 2019. Every season of Game of Thrones has gotten underway in April, except for Season 3 ( which started on March 31 ) and Season 7 ( which premiered July 16 ).
